field_speakers.processed:
Dali Yang (University of Chicago)

Neysun Mahboubi (University of Pennsylvania)

Mary Gallagher (University of Michigan)

Victor Shih (University of California, San Diego)

Sida Liu (University of Toronto)

Maggie Lewis (Seton Hall University)

Alex Wang (University of California, Los Angeles)

Iza Ding (University of Pittsburgh)

field_description.processed: The Zhengfawei 政法委 Standing Committee will chat with Dali Yang, the William Claude Reavis Professor of Political Science at the University of Chicago, about recent lockdowns in Shanghai (and other Chinese cities), and implications for the future of China's "Zero-Covid" policy.
